projects.Name: RayTracer
projects.Description: A high-performance ray tracing engine built with CUDA for real-time rendering. This project supports reflection, refraction, and Fresnel effects, making it capable of simulating realistic materials like glass and mirrors. It demonstrates physically-based rendering concepts, optimized GPU acceleration, and interactive scene visualization.

projects.Name: LC3-Box
projects.Description: A virtual machine simulating the LC-3 architecture, capable of running any assembled LC-3 program.

projects.Name: Notes-Solana
projects.Description: This Project is a tutorial project that I made while learning Solana on-chain native development.
